verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> And the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> of man הִנָּבֵ֛א <S%H5012><s%> prophesy אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against נְבִיאֵ֥י <S%H5030><s%> against the prophets יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הַנִּבָּאִ֑ים <S%H5012><s%> that prophesy וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <S%H559><s%> and say לִנְבִיאֵ֣י <S%H5030><s%> thou unto them that prophesy מִלִּבָּ֔ם <S%H3820><s%> out of their own hearts שִׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hear דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> ye the word יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD ה֖וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַנְּבִיאִ֣ים <S%H5030><s%> prophets הַנְּבָלִ֑ים <S%H5036><s%> unto the foolish אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who הֹלְכִ֛ים <S%H1980><s%> along אַחַ֥ר <S%H310><s%> after that רוּחָ֖ם <S%H7307><s%> their own spirit וּלְבִלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> nothing רָאֽוּ׃ <S%H7200><s%> and have seen
כְּשֻׁעָלִ֖ים <S%H7776><s%> are like the foxes בָּחֳרָב֑וֹת <S%H2723><s%> in the deserts נְבִיאֶ֥יךָ <S%H5030><s%> thy prophets יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> O Israel הָיֽוּ׃ <S%H1961><s%> have been

לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> nor עֲלִיתֶם֙ <S%H5927><s%> Ye have not gone up בַּפְּרָצ֔וֹת <S%H6556><s%> into the gaps וַתִּגְדְּר֥וּ <S%H1443><s%> neither made up גָדֵ֖ר <S%H1447><s%> the hedge עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> around בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> for the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לַעֲמֹ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> to stand בַּמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> in the battle בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

חָ֤זוּ <S%H2372><s%> They have seen שָׁוְא֙ <S%H7723><s%> vanity וְקֶ֣סֶם <S%H7081><s%> divination כָּזָ֔ב <S%H3577><s%> and lying הָאֹֽמְרִים֙ <S%H559><s%> saying נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD וַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> has not שְׁלָחָ֑ם <S%H7971><s%> hath not sent וְיִֽחֲל֖וּ <S%H3176><s%> them and they have made [others] to hope לְקַיֵּ֥ם <S%H6965><s%> that they would confirm דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> the word

הֲל֤וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not מַֽחֲזֵה־ <S%H4236><s%> vision שָׁוְא֙ <S%H7723><s%> a vain חֲזִיתֶ֔ם <S%H2372><s%> Have ye not seen וּמִקְסַ֥ם <S%H4738><s%> divination כָּזָ֖ב <S%H3577><s%> a lying אֲמַרְתֶּ֑ם <S%H1696><s%> and have ye not spoken וְאֹֽמְרִים֙ <S%H559><s%> whereas ye say נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD וַאֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not דִבַּֽרְתִּי׃ <S%H1696><s%> answer ס

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD יַ֚עַן <S%H3282><s%> Because דַּבֶּרְכֶ֣ם <S%H1696><s%> Because ye have spoken שָׁ֔וְא <S%H7723><s%> vanity וַחֲזִיתֶ֖ם <S%H2372><s%> and seen כָּזָ֑ב <S%H3577><s%> lies לָכֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> therefore הִנְנִ֣י <S%H2005><s%> behold אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> I am against נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> therefore behold I [am] against you saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD

וְהָיְתָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> will have יָדִ֗י <S%H3027><s%> And mine hand אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> will be against הַנְּבִיאִ֞ים <S%H5030><s%> shall be upon the prophets הַחֹזִ֣ים <S%H2374><s%> that see שָׁוְא֮ <S%H7723><s%> vanity וְהַקֹּסְמִ֣ים <S%H7080><s%> and that divine כָּזָב֒ <S%H3577><s%> lies בְּס֧וֹד <S%H5475><s%> they shall not be in the assembly עַמִּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> of my people לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יִהְי֗וּ <S%H1961><s%> place וּבִכְתָ֤ב <S%H3791><s%> in the writing בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor יִכָּתֵ֔בוּ <S%H3789><s%> neither shall they be written וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> will be against אַדְמַ֥ת <S%H127><s%> into the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor יָבֹ֑אוּ <S%H935><s%> neither shall they enter וִידַעְתֶּ֕ם <S%H3045><s%> and ye shall know כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I am אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> that I [am] the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> GOD

יַ֣עַן <S%H3282><s%> is definitely וּבְיַ֜עַן <S%H3282><s%> because הִטְע֧וּ <S%H2937><s%> Because even because they have seduced אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּ֛י <S%H5971><s%> my people לֵאמֹ֥ר <S%H559><s%> saying שָׁל֖וֹם <S%H7965><s%> Peace וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> is no שָׁל֑וֹם <S%H7965><s%> and [there was] no peace וְהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> anyone בֹּ֣נֶה <S%H1129><s%> and one built up חַ֔יִץ <S%H2434><s%> a wall וְהִנָּ֛ם <S%H2009><s%> and lo טָחִ֥ים <S%H2902><s%> others daubed אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> תָּפֵֽל׃ <S%H8602><s%> it with untempered

אֱמֹ֛ר <S%H559><s%> Say אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about טָחֵ֥י <S%H2902><s%> unto them which daub תָפֵ֖ל <S%H8602><s%> [it] with untempered וְיִפֹּ֑ל <S%H5307><s%> [morter] that it shall fall הָיָ֣ה ׀ <S%H1961><s%> will come גֶּ֣שֶׁם <S%H1653><s%> shower שׁוֹטֵ֗ף <S%H7857><s%> there shall be an overflowing וְאַתֵּ֜נָה <S%H859><s%> and ye אַבְנֵ֤י <S%H68><s%> stones אֶלְגָּבִישׁ֙ <S%H417><s%> great hail תִּפֹּ֔לְנָה <S%H5307><s%> shall fall וְר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> wind סְעָר֖וֹת <S%H5591><s%> and a stormy תְּבַקֵּֽעַ׃ <S%H1234><s%> shall rend

וְהִנֵּ֖ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold נָפַ֣ל <S%H5307><s%> is fallen הַקִּ֑יר <S%H7023><s%> Lo when the wall הֲלוֹא֙ <S%H3808><s%> not יֵאָמֵ֣ר <S%H559><s%> shall it not be said אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> about אַיֵּ֥ה <S%H346><s%> Where הַטִּ֖יחַ <S%H2915><s%> unto you Where [is] the daubing אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which טַחְתֶּֽם׃ <S%H2902><s%> wherewith ye have daubed ס

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD וּבִקַּעְתִּ֥י <S%H1234><s%> I will even rend רֽוּחַ־ <S%H7307><s%> wind סְעָר֖וֹת <S%H5591><s%> [it] with a stormy בַּֽחֲמָתִ֑י <S%H2534><s%> in my fury וְגֶ֤שֶׁם <S%H1653><s%> shower שֹׁטֵף֙ <S%H7857><s%> and there shall be an overflowing בְּאַפִּ֣י <S%H639><s%> in mine anger יִֽהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> become וְאַבְנֵ֥י <S%H68><s%> stones אֶלְגָּבִ֖ישׁ <S%H417><s%> great hail בְּחֵמָ֥ה <S%H2534><s%> in [my] fury לְכָלָֽה׃ <S%H3617><s%> to consume

וְהָ֨רַסְתִּ֜י <S%H2040><s%> So will I break down אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַקִּ֨יר <S%H7023><s%> the wall אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which טַחְתֶּ֥ם <S%H2902><s%> that ye have daubed תָּפֵ֛ל <S%H8602><s%> with untempered וְהִגַּעְתִּ֥יהוּ <S%H5060><s%> [morter] and bring אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> it down to the ground וְנִגְלָ֣ה <S%H1540><s%> thereof shall be discovered יְסֹד֑וֹ <S%H3247><s%> so that the foundation וְנָֽפְלָה֙ <S%H5307><s%> and it shall fall וּכְלִיתֶ֣ם <S%H3615><s%> and ye shall be consumed בְּתוֹכָ֔הּ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H3045><s%> thereof and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD

וְכִלֵּיתִ֤י <S%H3615><s%> Thus will I accomplish אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲמָתִי֙ <S%H2534><s%> my wrath בַּקִּ֔יר <S%H7023><s%> upon the wall וּבַטָּחִ֥ים <S%H2902><s%> and upon them that have daubed אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> תָּפֵ֑ל <S%H8602><s%> it with untempered וְאֹמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> [morter] and will say לָכֶם֙ אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> is gone הַקִּ֔יר <S%H7023><s%> unto you The wall וְאֵ֖ין <S%H369><s%> are gone הַטָּחִ֥ים <S%H2902><s%> [is] no [more] neither they that daubed אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

נְבִיאֵ֣י <S%H5030><s%> [To wit] the prophets יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הַֽנִבְּאִים֙ <S%H5012><s%> which prophesy אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> concerning Jerusalem וְהַחֹזִ֥ים <S%H2374><s%> and which see לָ֖הּ חֲז֣וֹן <S%H2377><s%> visions שָׁלֹ֑ם <S%H7965><s%> of peace וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> there שָׁלֹ֔ם <S%H7965><s%> for her and [there is] no peace נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהֹוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD פ

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> now you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> Likewise thou son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> of man שִׂ֤ים <S%H7760><s%> set פָּנֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H6440><s%> thy face אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against בְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> against the daughters עַמְּךָ֔ <S%H5971><s%> of thy people הַמִּֽתְנַבְּא֖וֹת <S%H5012><s%> which prophesy מִֽלִּבְּהֶ֑ן <S%H3820><s%> out of their own heart וְהִנָּבֵ֖א <S%H5012><s%> and prophesy עֲלֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H5921><s%> against

וְאָמַרְתָּ֞ <S%H559><s%> And say כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הוֹי֩ <S%H1945><s%> Woe לִֽמְתַפְּר֨וֹת <S%H8609><s%> to the [women] that sew כְּסָת֜וֹת <S%H3704><s%> pillows עַ֣ל ׀ <S%H5921><s%> on כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אַצִּילֵ֣י <S%H679><s%> joint יָדַ֗י <S%H3027><s%> able וְעֹשׂ֧וֹת <S%H6213><s%> and make הַמִּסְפָּח֛וֹת <S%H4555><s%> kerchiefs עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> upon the head כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every קוֹמָ֖ה <S%H6967><s%> of every stature לְצוֹדֵ֣ד <S%H6679><s%> to hunt נְפָשׁ֑וֹת <S%H5315><s%> souls הַנְּפָשׁוֹת֙ <S%H5315><s%> the souls תְּצוֹדֵ֣דְנָה <S%H6679><s%> Will ye hunt לְעַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> of my people וּנְפָשׁ֖וֹת <S%H5315><s%> the souls לָכֶ֥נָה <S%H2421><s%> alive תְחַיֶּֽינָה׃ <S%H2421><s%> preserve

וַתְּחַלֶּלְ֨נָה <S%H2490><s%> And will ye pollute אֹתִ֜י <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עַמִּ֗י <S%H5971><s%> me among my people בְּשַׁעֲלֵ֣י <S%H8168><s%> for handfuls שְׂעֹרִים֮ <S%H8184><s%> of barley וּבִפְת֣וֹתֵי <S%H6595><s%> and for pieces לֶחֶם֒ <S%H3899><s%> of bread לְהָמִ֤ית <S%H4191><s%> to slay נְפָשׁוֹת֙ <S%H5315><s%> the souls אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תְמוּתֶ֔נָה <S%H4191><s%> that should not die וּלְחַיּ֥וֹת <S%H2421><s%> alive נְפָשׁ֖וֹת <S%H5315><s%> the souls אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תִֽחְיֶ֑ינָה <S%H2421><s%> that should not live בְּכַ֨זֶּבְכֶ֔ם <S%H3576><s%> by your lying לְעַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> to my people שֹׁמְעֵ֥י <S%H8085><s%> that hear כָזָֽב׃ <S%H3577><s%> deceitful ס

לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <S%H559><s%> Wherefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הִנְנִ֤י <S%H2005><s%> behold אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> I am against כִּסְּתוֹתֵיכֶ֙נָה֙ <S%H3704><s%> Behold I [am] against your pillows אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which אַ֠תֵּנָה <S%H859><s%> wherewith ye מְצֹדְד֨וֹת <S%H6679><s%> there hunt שָׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנְּפָשׁוֹת֙ <S%H5315><s%> the souls לְפֹ֣רְח֔וֹת <S%H6524><s%> to make [them] fly וְקָרַעְתִּ֣י <S%H7167><s%> and I will tear אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> from זְרוֹעֹֽתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H2220><s%> them from your arms וְשִׁלַּחְתִּי֙ <S%H7971><s%> go אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנְּפָשׁ֔וֹת <S%H5315><s%> and will let the souls אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom אַתֶּ֛ם <S%H859><s%> you מְצֹדְד֥וֹת <S%H6679><s%> that ye hunt אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נְפָשִׁ֖ים <S%H5315><s%> [even] the souls לְפֹרְחֹֽת׃ <S%H6524><s%> to make [them] fly

וְקָרַעְתִּ֞י <S%H7167><s%> also will I tear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִסְפְּחֹֽתֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H4555><s%> Your kerchiefs וְהִצַּלְתִּ֤י <S%H5337><s%> and deliver אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּי֙ <S%H5971><s%> my people מִיֶּדְכֶ֔ן <S%H3027><s%> out of your hand וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will no יִהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer בְּיֶדְכֶ֖ן <S%H3027><s%> and they shall be no more in your hand לִמְצוּדָ֑ה <S%H4686><s%> to be hunted וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ן <S%H3045><s%> and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD

יַ֣עַן <S%H3282><s%> Because הַכְא֤וֹת <S%H3512><s%> sad לֵב־ <S%H3820><s%> ye have made the heart צַדִּיק֙ <S%H6662><s%> of the righteous שֶׁ֔קֶר <S%H8267><s%> Because with lies וַאֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not הִכְאַבְתִּ֑יו <S%H3510><s%> whom I have not made sad וּלְחַזֵּק֙ <S%H2388><s%> and strengthened יְדֵ֣י <S%H3027><s%> the hands רָשָׁ֔ע <S%H7451><s%> of the wicked לְבִלְתִּי־ <S%H1115><s%> not שׁ֛וּב <S%H7725><s%> that he should not return מִדַּרְכּ֥וֹ <S%H1870><s%> way הָרָ֖ע <S%H7563><s%> from his wicked לְהַחֲיֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H2421><s%> by promising him life

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> therefore שָׁ֚וְא <S%H7723><s%> no more vanity לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will no תֶחֱזֶ֔ינָה <S%H2372><s%> Therefore ye shall see וְקֶ֖סֶם <S%H7081><s%> divinations לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> will no תִקְסַ֣מְנָה <S%H7080><s%> nor divine ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer וְהִצַּלְתִּ֤י <S%H5337><s%> for I will deliver אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּי֙ <S%H5971><s%> my people מִיֶּדְכֶ֔ן <S%H3027><s%> out of your hand וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ן <S%H3045><s%> and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD
